fsrtool.name: fsrtool_user_notifications
fsrtool.structure: CREATE TABLE `fsrtool_user_notifications` ( `charID` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `email` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `push_user` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `push_token` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `email_valid` tinyint(3) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `push_valid` tinyint(3) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `notivications` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`charID`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
